snippet: A public prosecutor on Friday appealed the rulings of a French court on Wednesday in a gang-rape trial, calling many of the 10 acquittals in the case and the sentences for the four convictions inappropriate.
abstract: Public prosecutor appeals the rulings of French court  in gruesome gang-rape trial, calling many of the 10 acquittals and sentences for the four convictions inappropriate.
lead_paragraph: A public prosecutor on Friday appealed the rulings of a French court on Wednesday in a gang-rape trial, calling many of the 10 acquittals in the case and the sentences for the four convictions inappropriate.
